sentences.en: He made her a girdle of finely wrought gold and wove magic into the filigree work.
sentences.cn: 他用精金为她做了一条腰带,并将其施以魔法.

sentences.en: Made from sterling silver , this pendant features a filigree design with a cross and a heart.
sentences.cn: 这款坠鍊的材质为纯银,以细丝工艺制作成十字架及爱心的样式.

sentences.en: Mithril filigree has a slightly reduced range that it gives skillups.
sentences.cn: 秘银细丝现在能提升的技能等级下降.

sentences.en: The art filigree tapestry is elegant and magnificent.
sentences.cn: 嵌金银丝艺术挂毯,绚丽雅典.

sentences.en: The blue sandstone face contrast the stainless steel filigree and case.
sentences.cn: 蓝色沙岩表面与不锈钢花边和表壳对比感强烈.

sentences.en: The bushes are silver filigree, so light , so much on tiptoe in this enchanted world.
sentences.cn: 低矮的灌木丛犹如银丝饰物, 踮着脚尖立于这个令人沉醉的世界.

sentences.en: The filigree, presumably by virtue of these fields, completely alters the structure of the granulation.
sentences.cn: 大概是由于这些磁场的作用, 精细网络完全改变了米粒组织的结构.

sentences.en: The frost made a beautiful filigree on the window pane.
sentences.cn: 寒霜在玻璃窗上形成了美丽的花纹.

sentences.en: They were mounted in gold filigree settings.
sentences.cn: 这些宝石都是镶在金槽里.

sentences.en: This beautiful , highly detailed wrought iron wall cross features fleur tips and a filigree design.
sentences.cn: 这款精巧细致的锻铁十字架使用细丝工艺装饰,尾端为鸢尾花图样.

sentences.en: This beautiful wall cross filigree style hearts intertwined in the shape of a cross.
sentences.cn: 这款精美的挂壁十字架,将细丝爱心缠绕成十字的形状.

sentences.en: This handcrafted solid sterling silver ring features a filigree band with key cross and heart design.
sentences.cn: 这枚纯银戒指用银丝细工装饰、采钥匙穿心的造型.

sentences.en: Xianghe filigree jewelry base of China's ancient Silk inheritance and development of technology.
sentences.cn: 香河花丝首饰是我国古老的垒丝工艺的继承和发展.

sentences.en: You have very skilled and patient hands to make such fine, filigree works.
sentences.cn: 你用非常熟练的技巧和足够的耐心创作出如此美的,金银丝细工的作品.

words.tran_cn: 金银丝细工；金银丝工艺品

trans.tran_cn: （用金丝等制成的）精工制品，精致的物品，华而不实的东西
trans.tran_en: delicate designs or decorations made of gold or silver wire
